verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> to the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel תֹּאמַר֒ <S%H559><s%> Again thou shalt say אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> Whosoever אִישׁ֩ <S%H376><s%> man מִבְּנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> [he be] of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> any הַגֵּ֣ר ׀ <S%H1616><s%> or of the strangers הַגָּ֣ר <S%H1481><s%> that sojourn בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> in Israel אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who יִתֵּ֧ן <S%H5414><s%> that giveth מִזַּרְע֛וֹ <S%H2233><s%> [any] of his seed לַמֹּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4432><s%> unto Molech מ֣וֹת <S%H4191><s%> he shall surely יוּמָ֑ת <S%H4191><s%> be put to death עַ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> the people הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land יִרְגְּמֻ֥הוּ <S%H7275><s%> shall stone בָאָֽבֶן׃ <S%H68><s%> him with stones

וַאֲנִ֞י <S%H589><s%> I אֶתֵּ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> And I will set אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פָּנַי֙ <S%H6440><s%> my face בָּאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> against that man הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וְהִכְרַתִּ֥י <S%H3772><s%> and will cut him off אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> מִקֶּ֣רֶב <S%H7130><s%> from among עַמּ֑וֹ <S%H5971><s%> his people כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> because מִזַּרְעוֹ֙ <S%H2233><s%> of his seed נָתַ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> because he hath given לַמֹּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4432><s%> unto Molech לְמַ֗עַן <S%H4616><s%> so טַמֵּא֙ <S%H2930><s%> to defile אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִקְדָּשִׁ֔י <S%H4720><s%> my sanctuary וּלְחַלֵּ֖ל <S%H2490><s%> and to profane אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> name קָדְשִֽׁי׃ <S%H6944><s%> my holy

וְאִ֡ם <S%H518><s%> If הַעְלֵ֣ם <S%H5956><s%> do any ways יַעְלִימֽוּ֩ <S%H5956><s%> hide עַ֨ם <S%H5971><s%> And if the people הָאָ֜רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֵֽינֵיהֶם֙ <S%H5869><s%> their eyes מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> any הָאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> from the man הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he בְּתִתּ֥וֹ <S%H5414><s%> when he giveth מִזַּרְע֖וֹ <S%H2233><s%> of his seed לַמֹּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4432><s%> unto Molech לְבִלְתִּ֖י <S%H1115><s%> him not הָמִ֥ית <S%H4191><s%> and kill אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%>

וְשַׂמְתִּ֨י <S%H7760><s%> Then I will set אֲנִ֧י <S%H589><s%> Myself אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פָּנַ֛י <S%H6440><s%> my face בָּאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> against that man הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וּבְמִשְׁפַּחְתּ֑וֹ <S%H4940><s%> and against his family וְהִכְרַתִּ֨י <S%H3772><s%> and will cut him off אֹת֜וֹ <S%H853><s%> וְאֵ֣ת ׀ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַזֹּנִ֣ים <S%H2181><s%> and all that go a whoring אַחֲרָ֗יו <S%H310><s%> after לִזְנ֛וֹת <S%H2181><s%> him to commit whoredom אַחֲרֵ֥י <S%H310><s%> after הַמֹּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4432><s%> with Molech מִקֶּ֥רֶב <S%H7130><s%> from among עַמָּֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> their people

וְהַנֶּ֗פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> And the soul אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who תִּפְנֶ֤ה <S%H6437><s%> that turneth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> after הָֽאֹבֹת֙ <S%H178><s%> such as have familiar spirits וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to הַיִּדְּעֹנִ֔ים <S%H3049><s%> wizards לִזְנ֖וֹת <S%H2181><s%> to go a whoring אַחֲרֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H310><s%> and after וְנָתַתִּ֤י <S%H5414><s%> them I will even set אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פָּנַי֙ <S%H6440><s%> my face בַּנֶּ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> against that soul הַהִ֔וא <S%H1931><s%> he וְהִכְרַתִּ֥י <S%H3772><s%> and will cut him off אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> מִקֶּ֥רֶב <S%H7130><s%> from among עַמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5971><s%> his people

וְהִ֨תְקַדִּשְׁתֶּ֔ם <S%H6942><s%> Sanctify וִהְיִיתֶ֖ם <S%H1961><s%> and be ye קְדֹשִׁ֑ים <S%H6918><s%> yourselves therefore and be ye holy כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> your God

וּשְׁמַרְתֶּם֙ <S%H8104><s%> And ye shall keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֻקֹּתַ֔י <S%H2708><s%> my statutes וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֖ם <S%H6213><s%> and do אֹתָ֑ם <S%H853><s%> אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> them I [am] the LORD מְקַדִּשְׁכֶֽם׃ <S%H6942><s%> which sanctify

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> If אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> For every אִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> one אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who יְקַלֵּ֧ל <S%H7043><s%> that curseth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָבִ֛יו <S%H1><s%> his father וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אִמּ֖וֹ <S%H517><s%> or his mother מ֣וֹת <S%H4191><s%> shall be surely יוּמָ֑ת <S%H4191><s%> put to death אָבִ֧יו <S%H1><s%> his father וְאִמּ֛וֹ <S%H517><s%> or his mother קִלֵּ֖ל <S%H7043><s%> he hath cursed דָּמָ֥יו <S%H1818><s%> his blood בּֽוֹ׃

וְאִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And the man אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> who יִנְאַף֙ <S%H5003><s%> that committeth adultery אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for אֵ֣שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> wife אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> with [another] man's אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who יִנְאַ֖ף <S%H5003><s%> [even he] that committeth adultery אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for אֵ֣שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> wife רֵעֵ֑הוּ <S%H7453><s%> with his neighbour's מֽוֹת־ <S%H4191><s%> shall surely יוּמַ֥ת <S%H4191><s%> be put to death הַנֹּאֵ֖ף <S%H5003><s%> the adulterer וְהַנֹּאָֽפֶת׃ <S%H5003><s%> and the adulteress

וְאִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And the man אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> who יִשְׁכַּב֙ <S%H7901><s%> that lieth אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for אֵ֣שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> wife אָבִ֔יו <S%H1><s%> with his father's עֶרְוַ֥ת <S%H6172><s%> nakedness אָבִ֖יו <S%H1><s%> his father's גִּלָּ֑ה <S%H1540><s%> hath uncovered מֽוֹת־ <S%H4191><s%> of them shall surely יוּמְת֥וּ <S%H4191><s%> be put to death שְׁנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H8147><s%> both דְּמֵיהֶ֥ם <S%H1818><s%> their blood בָּֽם׃

וְאִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And if a man אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> who יִשְׁכַּב֙ <S%H7901><s%> lie אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with כַּלָּת֔וֹ <S%H3618><s%> with his daughter in law מ֥וֹת <S%H4191><s%> of them shall surely יוּמְת֖וּ <S%H4191><s%> be put to death שְׁנֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H8147><s%> both תֶּ֥בֶל <S%H8397><s%> confusion עָשׂ֖וּ <S%H6213><s%> they have wrought דְּמֵיהֶ֥ם <S%H1818><s%> their blood בָּֽם׃

וְאִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> If a man אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who יִשְׁכַּ֤ב <S%H7901><s%> also lie אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with זָכָר֙ <S%H2145><s%> with mankind מִשְׁכְּבֵ֣י <S%H4904><s%> as he lieth אִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> with a woman תּוֹעֵבָ֥ה <S%H8441><s%> an abomination עָשׂ֖וּ <S%H6213><s%> of them have committed שְׁנֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H8147><s%> both מ֥וֹת <S%H4191><s%> they shall surely יוּמָ֖תוּ <S%H4191><s%> be put to death דְּמֵיהֶ֥ם <S%H1818><s%> their blood בָּֽם׃

וְאִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And if a man אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who יִקַּ֧ח <S%H3947><s%> take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אִשָּׁ֛ה <S%H802><s%> a wife וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אִמָּ֖הּ <S%H517><s%> and her mother זִמָּ֣ה <S%H2154><s%> it [is] wickedness הִ֑וא <S%H1931><s%> he בָּאֵ֞שׁ <S%H784><s%> with fire יִשְׂרְפ֤וּ <S%H8313><s%> they shall be burnt אֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> וְאֶתְהֶ֔ן <S%H853><s%> וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> will be no תִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become זִמָּ֖ה <S%H2154><s%> both he and they that there be no wickedness בְּתוֹכְכֶֽם׃ <S%H8432><s%> among

וְאִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And if a man אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who יִתֵּ֧ן <S%H5414><s%> add שְׁכָבְתּ֛וֹ <S%H7903><s%> lie בִּבְהֵמָ֖ה <S%H929><s%> with a beast מ֣וֹת <S%H4191><s%> he shall surely יוּמָ֑ת <S%H4191><s%> be put to death וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבְּהֵמָ֖ה <S%H929><s%> the beast תַּהֲרֹֽגוּ׃ <S%H2026><s%> and ye shall slay

וְאִשָּׁ֗ה <S%H802><s%> And if a woman אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who תִּקְרַ֤ב <S%H7126><s%> approach אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any בְּהֵמָה֙ <S%H929><s%> unto any beast לְרִבְעָ֣ה <S%H7250><s%> and lie down אֹתָ֔הּ <S%H854><s%> for וְהָרַגְתָּ֥ <S%H2026><s%> thereto thou shalt kill אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> the woman וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבְּהֵמָ֑ה <S%H929><s%> and the beast מ֥וֹת <S%H4191><s%> they shall surely יוּמָ֖תוּ <S%H4191><s%> be put to death דְּמֵיהֶ֥ם <S%H1818><s%> their blood בָּֽם׃

וְאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And if a man אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who יִקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> shall take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲחֹת֡וֹ <S%H269><s%> his sister בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> daughter אָבִ֣יו <S%H1><s%> his father's א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> or בַת־ <S%H1323><s%> daughter אִ֠מּוֹ <S%H517><s%> his mother's וְרָאָ֨ה <S%H7200><s%> and see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֶרְוָתָ֜הּ <S%H6172><s%> her nakedness וְהִֽיא־ <S%H1931><s%> and she תִרְאֶ֤ה <S%H7200><s%> and she see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֶרְוָתוֹ֙ <S%H6172><s%> his nakedness חֶ֣סֶד <S%H2617><s%> it [is] a wicked thing ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> and they וְנִ֨כְרְת֔וּ <S%H3772><s%> and they shall be cut off לְעֵינֵ֖י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the sons עַמָּ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> of their people עֶרְוַ֧ת <S%H6172><s%> nakedness אֲחֹת֛וֹ <S%H269><s%> his sister's גִּלָּ֖ה <S%H1540><s%> he hath uncovered עֲוֹנ֥וֹ <S%H5771><s%> his iniquity יִשָּֽׂא׃ <S%H5375><s%> he shall bear

וְ֠אִישׁ <S%H376><s%> And if a man אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who יִשְׁכַּ֨ב <S%H7901><s%> shall lie אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for אִשָּׁ֜ה <S%H802><s%> with a woman דָּוָ֗ה <S%H1739><s%> having her sickness וְגִלָּ֤ה <S%H1540><s%> and shall uncover אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֶרְוָתָהּ֙ <S%H6172><s%> her nakedness אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מְקֹרָ֣הּ <S%H4726><s%> her fountain הֶֽעֱרָ֔ה <S%H6168><s%> he hath discovered וְהִ֕יא <S%H1931><s%> and she גִּלְּתָ֖ה <S%H1540><s%> and she hath uncovered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מְק֣וֹר <S%H4726><s%> the fountain דָּמֶ֑יהָ <S%H1818><s%> of her blood וְנִכְרְת֥וּ <S%H3772><s%> of them shall be cut off שְׁנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H8147><s%> and both מִקֶּ֥רֶב <S%H7130><s%> from among עַמָּֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> their people

וְעֶרְוַ֨ת <S%H6172><s%> the nakedness אֲח֧וֹת <S%H269><s%> sister אִמְּךָ֛ <S%H517><s%> of thy mother's וַאֲח֥וֹת <S%H269><s%> sister אָבִ֖יךָ <S%H1><s%> nor of thy father's לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not תְגַלֵּ֑ה <S%H1540><s%> And thou shalt not uncover כִּ֧י <S%H3588><s%> for אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁאֵר֛וֹ <S%H7607><s%> his near kin הֶעֱרָ֖ה <S%H6168><s%> for he uncovereth עֲוֹנָ֥ם <S%H5771><s%> their iniquity יִשָּֽׂאוּ׃ <S%H5375><s%> they shall bear

וְאִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And if a man אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> who יִשְׁכַּב֙ <S%H7901><s%> shall lie אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with דֹּ֣דָת֔וֹ <S%H1733><s%> with his uncle's wife עֶרְוַ֥ת <S%H6172><s%> nakedness דֹּד֖וֹ <S%H1730><s%> his uncle's גִּלָּ֑ה <S%H1540><s%> he hath uncovered חֶטְאָ֥ם <S%H2399><s%> their sin יִשָּׂ֖אוּ <S%H5375><s%> they shall bear עֲרִירִ֥ים <S%H6185><s%> childless יָמֻֽתוּ׃ <S%H4191><s%> they shall die

וְאִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And if a man אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who יִקַּ֛ח <S%H3947><s%> shall take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֵ֥שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> wife אָחִ֖יו <S%H251><s%> his brother's נִדָּ֣ה <S%H5079><s%> it [is] an unclean thing הִ֑וא <S%H1931><s%> he עֶרְוַ֥ת <S%H6172><s%> nakedness אָחִ֛יו <S%H251><s%> his brother's גִּלָּ֖ה <S%H1540><s%> he hath uncovered עֲרִירִ֥ים <S%H6185><s%> they shall be childless יִהְיֽוּ׃ <S%H1961><s%> are therefore

וּשְׁמַרְתֶּ֤ם <S%H8104><s%> Ye shall therefore keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all חֻקֹּתַי֙ <S%H2708><s%> all my statutes וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all מִשְׁפָּטַ֔י <S%H4941><s%> and all my judgments וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֖ם <S%H6213><s%> and do אֹתָ֑ם <S%H853><s%> וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not תָקִ֤יא <S%H6958><s%> therein spue you not out אֶתְכֶם֙ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> them that the land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> to which אֲנִ֜י <S%H589><s%> I am מֵבִ֥יא <S%H935><s%> whither I bring אֶתְכֶ֛ם <S%H853><s%> שָׁ֖מָּה <S%H8033><s%> in it לָשֶׁ֥בֶת <S%H3427><s%> you to dwell בָּֽהּ׃

וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תֵֽלְכוּ֙ <S%H1980><s%> follow בְּחֻקֹּ֣ת <S%H2708><s%> in the manners הַגּ֔וֹי <S%H1471><s%> of the nation אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I מְשַׁלֵּ֖חַ <S%H7971><s%> which I cast out מִפְּנֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H6440><s%> before כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> these עָשׂ֔וּ <S%H6213><s%> you for they committed וָאָקֻ֖ץ <S%H6973><s%> all these things and therefore I abhorred בָּֽם׃

וָאֹמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> But I have said לָכֶ֗ם אַתֶּם֮ <S%H859><s%> you תִּֽירְשׁ֣וּ <S%H3423><s%> unto you Ye shall inherit אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַדְמָתָם֒ <S%H127><s%> their land וַאֲנִ֞י <S%H589><s%> Myself אֶתְּנֶ֤נָּה <S%H5414><s%> and I will give לָכֶם֙ לָרֶ֣שֶׁת <S%H3423><s%> it unto you to possess אֹתָ֔הּ <S%H853><s%> אֶ֛רֶץ <S%H776><s%> it a land זָבַ֥ת <S%H2100><s%> that floweth חָלָ֖ב <S%H2461><s%> with milk וּדְבָ֑שׁ <S%H1706><s%> and honey אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> Myself יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> I [am] the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> your God אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who הִבְדַּ֥לְתִּי <S%H914><s%> which have separated אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָֽעַמִּֽים׃ <S%H5971><s%> you from [other] people

וְהִבְדַּלְתֶּ֞ם <S%H914><s%> Ye shall therefore put difference בֵּֽין־ <S%H996><s%> between הַבְּהֵמָ֤ה <S%H929><s%> beasts הַטְּהֹרָה֙ <S%H2889><s%> between clean לַטְּמֵאָ֔ה <S%H2931><s%> and unclean וּבֵין־ <S%H996><s%> and between הָע֥וֹף <S%H5775><s%> fowls הַטָּמֵ֖א <S%H2931><s%> and between unclean לַטָּהֹ֑ר <S%H2889><s%> and clean וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תְשַׁקְּצ֨וּ <S%H8262><s%> abominable אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַפְשֹֽׁתֵיכֶ֜ם <S%H5315><s%> and ye shall not make your souls בַּבְּהֵמָ֣ה <S%H929><s%> by beast וּבָע֗וֹף <S%H5775><s%> or by fowl וּבְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> anything אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which תִּרְמֹ֣שׂ <S%H7430><s%> or by any manner of living thing that creepeth הָֽאֲדָמָ֔ה <S%H127><s%> on the ground אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which הִבְדַּ֥לְתִּי <S%H914><s%> which I have separated לָכֶ֖ם לְטַמֵּֽא׃ <S%H2930><s%> from you as unclean

וִהְיִ֤יתֶם <S%H1961><s%> become לִי֙ קְדֹשִׁ֔ים <S%H6918><s%> And ye shall be holy כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for קָד֖וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> [am] holy אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> unto me for I the LORD וָאַבְדִּ֥ל <S%H914><s%> and have severed אֶתְכֶ֛ם <S%H853><s%> מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָֽעַמִּ֖ים <S%H5971><s%> you from [other] people לִהְי֥וֹת <S%H1961><s%> become לִֽי׃

וְאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> A man אֽוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or אִשָּׁ֗ה <S%H802><s%> also or woman כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> that hath יִהְיֶ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> become בָהֶ֥ם א֛וֹב <S%H178><s%> a familiar spirit א֥וֹ <S%H176><s%> or יִדְּעֹנִ֖י <S%H3049><s%> or that is a wizard מ֣וֹת <S%H4191><s%> shall surely יוּמָ֑תוּ <S%H4191><s%> be put to death בָּאֶ֛בֶן <S%H68><s%> them with stones יִרְגְּמ֥וּ <S%H7275><s%> they shall stone אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> דְּמֵיהֶ֥ם <S%H1818><s%> their blood בָּֽם׃ פ
